Export.Routine: #include Globs Start set file=##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() set file.Filename ="C:\Users\shmidt\Desktop\temp.txt" set file2=##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() set file2.Filename ="C:\Users\shmidt\Desktop\temp_unhex.txt" do file2.Clear() set file2.RemoveOnClose=0 for { q:file.AtEnd set str = file.Read($$$BLOCKSIZE) do ##class(Globals.Utils).DecodeAndSave(str,file2) } w !, "Successfully.." d file2.%Save() d file2.%Close()
